title: kloola WebApps
description: Developed the Kloola omnichannel management system platform from scratch and launched it to the market, receiving positive feedback from early adopters and increasing customer retention by 35% in the first two months after launch.

title: Kloola Website
description: Created the Kloola.id website for Go-To-Market (GTM) purposes, gaining 100,00 visitors per month and a 10% conversion rate. The website met customer need and followed the latest market trends..

title: Kloola Chat Desktop
description: Led the creation of Kloola Desktop Chat, ensuring it met regulatory requirements and was launched on schedule. The platform successfully met user needs in the Chat Management System, allowing users to manage chats and transact with buyers on one platform.
